0 CLS0:DIMI,A,A$,M,X:M=16384:POKE16925,0:POKE16926,1:GOTO110
7 PRINTA$;:A=((PEEK(17024)AND1)*256+PEEK(17025))-1+M:FORI=A-LEN(A$)+1TOA:POKEI,PEEK(I)-64:NEXT:RETURN
110 A=0:B=143:Z=M+480+16:D=125:C=62:G=0:W=0:Z1=M+64
120 RESTORE:X=32:FORI=.TO255:READA:POKEA,X:POKEA+1,X:NEXT:GOSUB390:S=0
130 PRINT@10,"g";:PRINT@12,"o";:PRINT@14,"b";:PRINT@16,"l";:PRINT@18,"i";:PRINT@20,"n";
150 FORI=1TO65
160 X=RND(351)+Z1:IFPEEK(X)=BTHEN160
180 POKEX,B:NEXT
190 PRINT@480,;:A$="A=LEFT                   S=RIGH":GOSUB7:POKEM+511,20:G=0:W=0:FORI=1TO20
200 X=RND(351)+Z1:A=PEEK(X):IFA=BORA=15ORA=CTHEN200
220 IFPEEK(X+31)=BTHENIFPEEK(X+32)=BTHENIFPEEK(X+33)=BTHENPOKEX,32:G=G+1:GOTO240
221 IFPEEK(X-31)=BTHENIFPEEK(X-32)=BTHENIFPEEK(X-33)=BTHENPOKEX,32:G=G+1:GOTO240
230 POKEX,15
240 NEXT
250 POKEZ,32:Z=Z-32:IFZ<Z1THENZ=Z+416
260 A=PEEK(2)ANDPEEK(17023):IFA=65THENZ=Z-1:C=62
270 IFA=83ORA=68THENZ=Z+1:C=60
280 A=PEEK(Z):IFA=BTHEN410
290 IFA=15THENGOSUB330
300 POKEZ,C:FORT=1TOD:NEXT:POKEZ,61:FORT=1TOD:NEXT:POKEZ,C:FORT=1TOD:NEXT
310 IFW=20-GTHENGOSUB350:GOTO190
320 GOTO250
330 W=W+1:S=S+25:PRINT@32,;:A$="S="+STR$(S):GOSUB7:FORT=235TO244STEP3
340 POKEZ,C:SOUNDT,1:POKEZ,61:SOUNDT+1,1:POKEZ,C:SOUNDT+2,1:NEXT:RETURN
350 PRINT@480,"***********ALL RIGHT!**********";:POKEM+511,106
360 FORI=1TO25
370 POKE49151,64:FORA=1TO100:NEXT:POKE49151,.:FORA=1TO100:NEXT:NEXT
380 D=D-5:IFD<75THEND=75
385 FORX=1TO5:PRINT@491,"get ready";:SOUND200,2:PRINT@491,"GET READY";:SOUND100,2:NEXT
390 IFS>HSTHENHS=S
400 PRINT@54,;:A$="HS="+STR$(HS):GOSUB7:RETURN
410 FORA=255TO143STEP-16:POKEZ,A:SOUNDA,1:NEXT:FORA=255TO143STEP-16:POKEZ,A:SOUNDA,1:NEXT
445 FORI=1TO10:A$=INKEY$:NEXT
450 PRINT@480,"        PLAY AGAIN? (Y/N)      ";:POKEM+511,96
465 A$=INKEY$:IFA$=""THEN465
470 IFA$="Y"THEN110
490 IFA$="N"THENEND
500 GOTO465
600 DATA16624,16656,16654,16622,16590,16592,16594,16626,16658,16690,16688,16686,16684,16652,16620,16588,16556,16558,16560
601 DATA16562,16564,16596,16628,16660,16692,16724,16722,16720,16718,16716,16714,16682,16650,16618,16586,16554,16522,16524
602 DATA16526,16528,16530,16532,16534,16566,16598,16630,16662,16694,16726,16758,16756,16754,16752,16750,16748,16746,16744
603 DATA16712,16680,16648,16616,16584,16552,16520,16488,16490,16492,16494,16496,16498,16500,16502,16504,16536,16568,16600
604 DATA16632,16664,16696,16728,16760,16792,16790,16788,16786,16784,16782,16780,16778,16776,16774,16742,16710,16678,16646
605 DATA16614,16582,16550,16518,16486,16454,16456,16458,16460,16462,16464,16466,16468,16470,16472,16474,16506,16538,16570
606 DATA16602,16634,16666,16698,16730,16762,16794,16826,16824,16822,16820,16818,16816,16814,16812,16810,16808,16806,16804
607 DATA16772,16740,16708,16676,16644,16612,16580,16548,16516,16484,16452,16420,16422,16424,16426,16428,16430,16432,16434
608 DATA16436,16438,16440,16442,16444,16476,16508,16540,16572,16604,16636,16668,16700,16732,16764,16796,16828,16860,16858
609 DATA16856,16854,16852,16850,16848,16846,16844,16842,16840,16838,16836,16834,16802,16770,16738,16706,16674,16642,16610
610 DATA16578,16546,16514,16482,16450,16418,16386,16388,16390,16392,16394,16396,16398,16400,16402,16404,16406,16408,16410
611 DATA16412,16414,16446,16478,16510,16542,16574,16606,16638,16670,16702,16734,16766,16798,16830,16862,16894,16892,16890
612 DATA16888,16886,16884,16882,16880,16878,16876,16874,16872,16870,16868,16866,16864,16832,16800,16768,16736,16704,16672
613 DATA16640,16608,16576,16544,16512,16480,16448,16416,16384,19651
900 REM       "GOBLIN"
910 REM  COMPUTE! MAGAZINE
920 REM      JULY 1983
930 REM      DAN GOFF
940 REM MC-10 EDITS J. GERRIE
950 REM  'D' ALSO = RIGHT
